GenotypeGraph

Class GenotypeGraphSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
      • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeightedGenotypeGraph

    public class GenotypeGraphSimple
extends GenotypeGraph
    Generates a graph connecting all nodes with equal genotypes but for a single extra mutation in the receiver of the edge
    Author:
    rossi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> counts
      List of counts for each different genotype observed in the data set (usable to compute observed probabilities)

        E, geneLabelsOrder, id, V

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void countAndCompress()
      Compression step: Counts all redundant genotypes and reduces the repetitions to a single node REQUIRE this.nodes is sorted

      protected java.util.ArrayList<GenotypeNode> getParentsOf(GenotypeNode n) 
      protected void linkNodes()
      Linking step: Creates an edge from A to B only if A has one mutation less than B and and all other mutations are the same
      protected void prepareEdges()
      preparation and addition of edges to this graph
      protected void reset()
      Resets node IDs and adjacency matrix, used to allocate space for the adjacency matrix only after the compression step
